attributes.action: To.Erect a National Memorial to RAF Bomber Command
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Erect a National Memorial in London  to the over 55.000 brave young men who gave there lives1939-45 and played such a large part in gaining Victory in Europe,I applaurd the magnificent memorial to the'Battle of Britain'and feel that Bomber Commd.deserve the the same honour.Also appeal for public donations towards same.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Erect a National Memorial to RAF Bomber Command."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17063

Prime Minister's Office
